projectGridLines.title: Title: Research on Novel Technologies in Flavors and Fragrances for F&B and HPC Products
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Interns will delve into the rapidly evolving field of Flavors and Fragrances, analyzing

current market trends, technological advancements, and consumer demands. They will explore the

latest innovations and applications within this sector, particularly focusing on new technologies such as

bioprocessing, synthetic biology, and enzyme technology. The project aims to uncover opportunities for

growth and development, providing insights that can guide Absolute Foods in expanding its product

portfolio.

Skill sets: - Strong analytical and research skills. Interest in market analysis and business strategy.

Familiarity with synthetic biology, advanced fermentation, and other relevant technologies.

Expected learning: Gain expertise in market analysis, advanced technologies, and strategic thinking

within the Flavors and Fragrances industry.

Specific courses required for project execution: Students pursuing degrees in Life Sciences,

Biotechnology, Food Technology, or related fields
